title: I wasn't put on the Ocean week nautilus statue
body: ok so first i had 10 points during ocean week and my name isn't and wasn't at all. (my name was Warzolo99) i don't understand why i wasn't put on the list but my friend didn't get put on it either he also got 10 points and his name was lupus nocte. i don't understand why we aren't on the list and its kinda irritating seeing as i doubt there will be another one of these. {{item:3151}} {{item:3151}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Since your saying 10, i can almost guarantee your talking about the Wall Mural and not the Reef, the Reef is from 2015.
i thought i did both i may be getting the years wrong but me and my friend participated in both of them and did the event for both

From memory (and this may be wrong as this is a year and a half back now.) i believe that you had to get the points before we reached the goal, and that is why a bunch of my personal friends aren't on it (because you had to have done it in the first few days, as we hit the goal fairly quickly)

your memory serves correct. This is the reason why players feel they got the points (and did), but don't have their names on the statue. It also probably contributed to the length of the second event, to make sure not as many people missed out the second time around :D
My name isn't in it as well. I have no life so I'm sure I have enough points on either Ocean Week event.
Did you get 10 points this year or last? The nautilus reef was for ocean week 2015 not 2016
i believe i did both so i dont know
